meanings.definition: The total number of miles traveled
meanings.sent1: She calculated the milages of her road trip to be over 500 miles.
meanings.sent2: The milages on the odometer showed 300 miles.
meanings.sent3: The milages on the map seemed to be playing hide and seek with her.
meanings.sent4: His love for adventure knew no bounds, exploring milages of unknown territories.
meanings.sent5: The milages of the journey etched memories that would last a lifetime.

meanings.sent1: The milages of the marathon were challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: The milages between cities were marked on the highway signs.
meanings.sent3: The milages of the race seemed to be in a hurry to reach the finish line.
meanings.sent4: Her determination carried her through milages of rough terrain.
meanings.sent5: The milages of the road trip stretched out before them, full of possibilities.

meanings.definition: The amount of wear or use on a vehicle as measured by the number of miles it has traveled
meanings.sent1: The mechanic checked the milages on the car to determine its condition.
meanings.sent2: High milages on a vehicle can indicate the need for maintenance.
meanings.sent3: The milages on the old truck told stories of past adventures.
meanings.sent4: The milages on the rental car revealed it had been driven extensively.
meanings.sent5: The milages on the taxi showed the hard work it had endured over the years.
